10.8.17  3:13 pm   what's the secret to properly drawing a treble clef?

     start from the bottom, draw the straight line up, and without lifting, curl it around to the rest. and most importantly, do it casually and carefree, with a sense of confidence

     they are ok

     yes

     or do u wish you could do more content in that time period

     of course i do but that would have been impossible

     questions

     to make room for more cereal

     but what if i do

     will you ever follow my twitter

10.8.17  8:24 am   am i gonna get a messege that you answered my question or somethin? if not how do i know you answered it?

     i guess you'll have to read all the questions

10.8.17  7:50 am   have you ever encountered hate comments?

     oh hell yeah

      if you did how did you react?

     with love, and hate also

10.8.17  6:27 am   Will you answer my fucking question already. I've been sending out questions 10 times already and you haven't been answering any of them. Fucking answer me.

     which ones were yours

     how about now, as well as in the past and future

     seems relatable

      no

10.7.17  9:48 pm   I totally agree about capital letters being a bit distracting, and the more I read these questions/answers the more it makes sense to me. but saying 'i' always seems wrong to me when it's lowercase. I remember you saying that when a letter is by itself it is better when it's capitalized. why do you choose to lowercase your I's?

     5.23.17 9:58 pm

10.7.17  9:34 pm   will you ever go back to making black and white videos

     i think almost all my videos have had colors, but i could be wrong

10.7.17  9:30 pm   Does it piss you off that a lot of people see you as just a meme guy when you're a lot of things beside that, including an incredible musician who writes interesting things?

     if you wanna succeed broadly and strongly you have to be ok with different people liking you in different ways, in addition to some people liking you in every way and also some people liking you in no ways

10.7.17  9:11 pm   10.6.17  3:22 pm o i guess that rules me out, i have been taking ninja lessons but i am still unsuccessful.

     oh, i was thinking of someone who is self taught, or actually better yet was born a ninja

10.7.17  9:00 pm   have you ever been sent nudes on the questions page before?

     it's actually mostly nudes, except unfortunately it's all lizards

10.7.17  8:57 pm   will learning music theory make me a better music producer?

     which theory
10.7.17  8:31 pm   what if you found out that all your questions were being asked by the same person

10.7.17  7:52 pm   How or where do you find motivation to make stuff?

     if i didn't make any stuff, you wouldn't be here asking me this question

10.7.17  7:52 pm   Are books just mini trees?

     no

10.7.17  7:22 pm   what is the ninth word of your new video

     or

10.7.17  7:15 pm   my dog likes to chase planes is this normal. i don't know if he's trying to chase them away or if he likes them or if he is trying to direct them.

      to put it in perspective, planes are actually what is not normal

10.7.17  7:03 pm   is outside a sequel to "no seriously, how do you find love?"

     no

10.7.17  6:46 pm   hey bill what would you call this chord (from low to high- F D A B-)? Is it (and inversion of) B half diminished or Dmin6/F ? which is more correct?

     choose whichever one you like better, for the situation

10.7.17  6:35 pm   are you against purely electronic lyricless music

     i have my official position written down somewhere

10.7.17  5:51 pm   If I donated to you 5 million dollars what would be the first thing you'd do/buy, and would you still make music and videos

     i would put it in the bank. well actually, i would probably move to a better studio with sound isolation and more video options and maybe hire some camera operators. who knows maybe even hire some editors full time. probably a lot of things i could do

10.7.17  5:46 pm   

     it was really not fictional, i am always trying to meet people who take things as seriously as you do, and your audacity to write in a way that no one quite ever does also is evidence that you are taking things very seriously. whether or not we live in the same region, that might be a different story. but please feel free to get in touch, i would love to hear from you

10.7.17  5:39 pm   how much do you care about spelling errors

     it depends how i was trying to spell the thing

10.7.17  5:30 pm   it honestly sounds like the next content is near completion

     well it better be, it's due on tuesday

10.7.17  5:12 pm   do you enjoy learning stuff that you wont use in your productions?

     yes, but

     How often do you do this

     there's not too much time for that any more. and also there's the secret fact that anything i learn actually can be used in productions

     i think so

     no

     you'll have to try it and see

     i disagree
